item.title: Tina Fey, Marc Platt Team for ‘John Proctor Is the Villain’ Movie at Universal (Exclusive)
item.description: Kimberly Belflower will adapt her Tony-nominated Broadway play, while stage star Sadie Sink will executive produce.

item.title: Broadway Box Office: Sadie Sink Departs ‘John Proctor,’ ‘Boop’ Sees Closing Boost
item.description: ‘John Proctor Is the Villain’ hit $1.1 million as Sadie Sink finished her Tony-nominated run.
